mapper.select: SELECT u.fin_type_code, u.user_nickname, u.badge_code, u.user_visibility, u.user_intro, CONCAT(ft.fin_type_title, ' ', ft.fin_type_animal) AS fin_type_info FROM user u JOIN fin_type ft ON ft.fin_type_code = u.fin_type_code WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT p.post_title AS title, DATE(p.post_updated_time) AS postTime, p.post_like_hits AS postLikeHits FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.post_title AS title, DATE(p.post_updated_time) AS postTime, p.post_like_hits AS postLikeHits FROM like_hits lh JOIN post p ON lh.post_id = p.post_id WHERE lh.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY postTime desc;
